Title: Rattleballs
Writer: Pendleton Ward (creator), Cole Sanchez, Andy Ristaino, Kent Osborne (story), Pendleton Ward (story), Jack Pendarvis (story), Adam Muto (story)
Actors: Jeremy Shada, Hynden Walch, Rainn Wilson, John DiMaggio
Plot: Finn meets an old robot in the junkyard who promises to make Finn into a master swordsman.
